nodes.text: Tatrog was a male Nautolan who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He worked in the Olaris spaceport's mess hall in the bombed and destroyed city world of Taris.
Tatrog first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a Companion Customization Vendor in the Olaris Mess Hall on Taris.
